definition: choline (amine related to vitamin B complex)
gall bladder/courage/guts/gall/inner container (e.g. bladder of a football, inner container of a thermos)
acetylcholine ACh (amine related to vitamin B complex)
choline esterase (ChE), hydrolyzing enzyme in blood plasma

sentences.english: Choline can help improve your memory.
sentences.chinese: 膽鹼能夠幫助改善您的記憶力。

sentences.english: The mode of action of V-type organophosphate poisons on acetylcholinesterase has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了V類毒劑與乙酰膽鹼酯酶的作用方式。

sentences.english: Certain drugs and chemicals also have been shown to decrease the activity of pseudocholine esterase.
sentences.chinese: 有些藥物和化學制品也表明能降低擬膽鹼酯酶的活性。

sentences.english: Acetylcholine is lacking in people with Alzheimer's disease (AD).
sentences.chinese: 在阿茲海默氏失智症的病人身上，乙醯膽鹼是缺乏的。

sentences.english: The poisoning rebound time of all cases occurred in the decrease period of cholinesterase activity.
sentences.chinese: 中毒反跳發生的時間均在膽鹼酯酶活性下降的時期內。

sentences.english: Intramuscular succinylcholine does not provide satisfactory tracheal intubating condition in infants with congenital heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 肌注琥珀膽鹼不能提供有效的肌松作用和插管條件。

sentences.english: Choline is a substance similar to the B vitamins.
sentences.chinese: 膽鹼是一種類似於維生素B的物質。

sentences.english: The uptake of choline was also competitively inhibited by ethanolamine.
sentences.chinese: 乙醇胺競爭性地抑制膽鹼攝取，且存在劑量依賴關係。

sentences.english: Effects of the anticholinesterase agent may be antagonized .
sentences.chinese: 膽鹼酯酶劑的效果可能被對抗。

sentences.english: Each of these symptoms can be traced back to excessive stimulation of cholinergic neurons.
sentences.chinese: 這些症狀歸因於大量的膽鹼能神經細胞的刺激。

sentences.english: It has been found to be an inhibitor of the enzyme acetylcholinesterase.
sentences.chinese: 它已被認爲是抑制乙酰膽鹼酯酶的酶。

sentences.english: Suxamethonium-induced fasciculations(SIF)may result in postoperative myalgia .
sentences.chinese: 琥珀膽鹼誘導性肌顫可導致術後肌痛。

sentences.english: Objective To study the relationship between endocrinal islet A cell and cholinergic neurons.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討胰腺內分泌A細胞與膽鹼能神經的關係。

sentences.english: Infants in the non-acetylcholine receptor antibodies, its pathogenesis and heredity.
sentences.chinese: 病嬰中無乙酰膽鹼受體抗體，其發病機制與遺傳有關。

sentences.english: These drugs are known as anticholinergic agents and are designed to block acetylcholine.
sentences.chinese: 這些藥物被稱爲抗膽鹼能製劑和旨在阻止乙酰膽鹼。

sentences.english: These drugs are known as anticholinergic agents and are designed to block acetylcholine.
sentences.chinese: 這些藥物被稱爲抗膽鹼能製劑和旨在阻止乙酰膽鹼。
